Name: Bēl-šumu-iškun
ind.Name: Bēl-šumu-iškun
Role: passive (mentioned in relation to sb or sth else)

Name: Esagil-ramât
ind.Name: Esagil-ramât
Role:
master (of a slave)
witness, special (ina ašābi)

Name: Marduk-šumu-ibni
ind.Name: Marduk-šumu-ibni
Biography: Protagonist of the Ilia A+B archive. Younger brother of Nabû-bēlšunu and older brother of Nabû-ēṭer-napšāti and Nergal-iddin. Husband of {{f}}Inṣabtu/Marduk-šumu-iddin//Ša-nāšišu. Father of Nabû-balassu-iqbi (Nabû-bullissu), {{f}}Amat-Nanāya, {{f}}Amat-Ninlil and {{f}}Binunu. Grandfather of Libluṭ/Nabû-balāssu-iqbi.
